title: HLL Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 08 Apprentice Posts
description: The HLL Lifecare (HLL) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Trainee, Graduate Engineer Trainee, Diploma Trainee, Graduate Trainee, SSLC Trainee, Graduate Apprentice,  Technician Apprentice, ITI Trade Apprentice Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech in Civil Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Civil Engineering, Electrical Engineering, D.Pharm, ITI B.Sc, Diploma, and MBA can grab this chance and apply for the HLL Recruitment 2025...
